00711 void help() {
00712  std::cerr << "usage: <program name> <axis size> [<options> <fileName>]\n"
00713            << "options: \n"
00714            << "  -help  to show this help\n"
00715            << std::endl;
00716 }
00717 void show_STEP(const std::string text) {
00718   int len=text.length();
00719   std::cout << "\n" << std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)
00720             << std::setw(len) << std::setfill('=') << "\n" << text 
00721             << std::setw(len) << std::setfill('=') << "\n" << std::endl;
00722 }
00723 
00724 void show_quant(const catalogAccess::Quantity &nQ) {
00725   std::cout << nQ.m_name <<": ucd=\""<< nQ.m_ucd <<"\", type="<< nQ.m_type
00726            <<", unit=\""<< nQ.m_unit <<"\", format=\""<< nQ.m_format
00727           <<"\",\n     index="<< nQ.m_index <<", boolGeneric="<< nQ.m_isGeneric
00728          <<", boolNaN="<< nQ.m_rejectNaN <<", TNULL=\""<< nQ.m_null
00729         <<"\",\n     selectList sizes=("<< nQ.m_listValN.size() <<" num, "
00730        << nQ.m_listValS.size() <<" str), cuts=" << nQ.m_lowerCut <<" to "
00731       << nQ.m_upperCut << "\ncomment=\""<< nQ.m_comment << "\"" << std::endl;
00732 }
00733 void show_string(const std::string name, const std::string val) {
00734   std::cout << "Quantity " << name << ": \"" << val <<"\""<< std::endl; 
00735 }
00736 void show_double(const std::string name, const double val) {
00737   std::cout << "Quantity " << name << " = " //<< std::setprecision(4)
00738 //            << val << std::endl;
00739             << std::setiosflags(outDouble) << std::setprecision(3)
00740             << std::setw(11) << std::setfill(' ')
00741             << val << std::resetiosflags(outDouble) << std::endl;
00742 }
